description: Adam King from County Cork captured the hearts of TV viewers with dreams of joining a space mission.
title: Adam King: Six-year-old Irish boy's space ambition 'inspires' Nasa
title_page: Adam King: Six-year-old Irish boy's space ambition 'inspires' Nasa - BBC News
maintext: "There's space for everybody at NASA, and we can't wait for him to one day join our team of dreamers. We'll be here when he's ready."
